item.title: Apache Hop 2.4 is available!!
item.description: After another two months of work on 98 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.4.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.4 brings: New Features Improvements Container image Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.4.0 right away. Apache Hop 2.
